original_text: At the same time that my sanity was restored, my honor and splendor were returned to me for the glory of my kingdom. My advisers and nobles sought me out, and I was restored to my throne and became even greater than before.
korean_text: 그 때에 내 총명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 내 나라의 영광에 대하여도 내 위엄과 광명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 나의 모사들과 관원들이 내게 찾아오니 내가 내 나라에서 다시 세움을 받고 또 지극한 위세가 내게 더하였느니라

sentences.original_text: At the same time that my sanity was restored
my honor and splendor were returned to me
for the glory of my kingdom
My advisers and nobles sought me out
and I was restored to my throne
and became even greater than before
